headerDisplay: Basic support for Siegenia MHS Family Windoiws. See the [homebridge-siegenia](https://github.com/EvotecIT/homebridge-siegenia) page for more information.

ip.title: Device IP
ip.description: Hostname or IP address of your device

port.title: Device Port
port.description: Port of your device. Default is 443. If you are using different port please change it here.

maxRetries:.title: Max Retries
maxRetries:.description: Max retries for connection. Default is 3.

waitTimeBetweenRetries.title: First Wait Time Between Retries
waitTimeBetweenRetries.description: First Wait time between retries in seconds. Default is 5. This is doubled after each retry.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: Polling interval in seconds for device state. Default is 5.

heartbeatInterval.title: Heartbeat Interval
heartbeatInterval.description: Heartbeat interval in seconds. Default is 10.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enable debug mode. Default is false.
